nodes.text: Tysara was a female Tarasin who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Tysara lived on the planet Cularin, where she was the Mother of a Tarasin irstat. During the time of the Clone Wars, a number of Tarasin were kidnapped by the slaver Haast Aath, so Tysara hired the Heroes of Cularin to rescue them.
